short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This will increase your focus to Next Level

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features :
- Study Timer
- Task List
- You can save your Todo and also can time it.
- Increase Productivity to next level


Important :  For Extension to  work you have to left click on extension and popup will appear.
- You can change the time by  right click on todo timer icon
